reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Promoting best practice on the green and low-carbon development of "Characteristic Small Towns" suggested by China

description.narrative: The project is designed to draw on UK experience to support China's Ministry of Housing and Urban and Rural Development to adopt green and low carbon policies and technologies in its planning for "Characteristic Small Towns". The envisaged timetable is for the Ministry to issue Case Studies, Policies and Assessment Methodologies by June 2017. Then for three small towns in China to adopt the policies, technologies and best practices by March 2017. This is expected to generate opportunities for international businesses, including UK ones.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
